sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The UK's former Prime Minister Boris Johnson deliberately misled lawmakers and would have been banned from Parliament's lower house if he hadn't resigned last week. A scathing report from

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: the House of Commons Privileges Committee found Johnson had lied about holding parties during the pandemic lockdown. He stood down as an MP on Friday ahead of the publication of the damning report.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: It's the culmination of a year-long investigation into Johnson's conduct during the pandemic, which also found he was complicit in the campaign of abuse and attempted intimidation of the committee.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: It's the latest episode in the so-called Partygate scandal, which revealed members of Johnson's staff held a series of parties in 2020 and 2021, when such gatherings were prohibited by pandemic restrictions.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Johnson dismissed the committee as a kangaroo court, which hadn't looked at the facts.

sentences.sentence: Οι άνθρωποι έχουν δικαίωμα να έρχονται στη χώρα μας και στην Ευρώπη και πρέπει να τους φροντίζουμε.

sentences.sentence: Είναι απίστευτο το πώς με δύο μποφόρ μπορεί να έγινε όλο αυτό το κακό.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
